levels.description: Performs an attack with <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK against all enemies in range, inflicting <@ba.vup>{amiya3_s_2[debuff].attack_speed}</> ASPD and <@ba.vup>{amiya3_s_2[debuff].move_speed:0%}</> Movement Speed on targets for <@ba.vup>{amiya3_s_2[debuff].duration}</>s. For every enemy hit, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> (up to <@ba.vup>{max_stack_cnt}</> stacks), subsequent damage becomes <@ba.vup>True</>, and attacks <@ba.vup>2</> enemies at once. <@ba.rem>This skill can only be used once per battle.</>
